# Past Perfect Progressive

*Rule**  •  Highlights the *ongoing* nature of a past action up to a second past moment.

**Example (news headline – text + link)**

*“Factory workers **had been striking** for weeks when management finally agreed to negotiate.”* – *The Guardian*, 12 Apr 2023.

<https://www.theguardian.com/business/2023/apr/12/factory-workers-end-strike>
